official.headline: Citizen Voices Heard
official.anchor_line: The Council launches a citywide Citizen Tribunal, inviting residents to share stories of their Behavioral Compliance Index results.
official.contextual_reframing: This transparent initiative strengthens collective trust and highlights the rational foundations of our data-driven governance.

official.headline: Accountability Ensured
official.anchor_line: During live broadcasts, the Tribunal reviews BCI cases and swiftly corrects any data irregularities, holding officials to high standards.
official.contextual_reframing: Systemic checks ensure efficiency and reinforce the humane, self-correcting nature of Stenograd’s automated governance.

official.headline: Stability Prioritized
official.anchor_line: To maintain public order, the Council concludes the Tribunal’s sessions, resuming focus on uninterrupted city services.
official.contextual_reframing: Swift resolution demonstrates system resilience and the Council’s commitment to harmony in daily life.

underground.headline: Truth Interrupted
underground.anchor_line: Citizen Tribunal goes live, survivors and wrongfully flagged speak out at last.
underground.contextual_reframing: For once, BCI stories aren't just numbers. The public hears real voices from those held and denied. The system—a citywide behavior scoring machine—just blinked.

underground.headline: Silenced Again
underground.anchor_line: Tribunal testimony exposes BCI abuse. Council cuts the feed and erases evidence.
underground.contextual_reframing: Transparency lasted days. Now the blackout is back, but leaks from inside show officials scrambled to hide just how broken the BCI and its predictive controls have become.

underground.headline: Trust Shattered
underground.anchor_line: People gather in the streets, mourning the lost chance for real reform. Songs and chalk, not reforms, mark what’s left.
underground.contextual_reframing: Public hope lingered for open systems—now the only trace is memories and neon graffiti. Stenograd feels smaller under the watch of scoring, sensors, and silence.
